meanings.definition: A musical instrument with strings, similar to a violin.
meanings.sent1: The musician played beautiful melodies on the rebecks.
meanings.sent2: She learned to play the rebecks at a young age.
meanings.sent3: The rebecks in the band added a unique sound to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the rebecks like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rebecks echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.

meanings.sent1: He rebecks with passion and skill.
meanings.sent3: She rebecks all day, bringing joy to those around her.
meanings.sent4: The music teacher encouraged her students to rebecks with confidence.
meanings.sent5: Rebecks gently, and the music will flow effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The collection of rebecks displayed in the museum was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The rebecks on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the enchanting sound of rebecks.
meanings.sent5: Each of the rebecks had a unique charm and history.
